alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 05 at 4:44PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Box Elder and northwestern Tooele Counties through 530 PM MDT... At 444 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 17 miles south of Oakley Reservoir to 32 miles southwest of Park Valley to 17 miles east of Montello to 18 miles north of West Wendover. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Park Valley, Utah Test and Training Range North, Etna, Standrod, Grouse Creek, Lynn, Lucin, Rosette and Yost. This includes Utah Route 30 between mile markers 1 and 58. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
